website_summaries.verdict: With a skylight and bay windows, this large, luxurious playhouse can hold several children from around 18 months to age 10, but even adults can fit inside.
pros: 2 bay windows, Dutch door and peaked roof with skylight
Inside features include full kitchen with range, storage and cordless phone with sound
Measures 66"H 73"L x 66"W. For ages 18 months and up
cons: The roof can be challenging to attach, so consider having at least 2 people available for assembly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Great size!
customer_reviews.text: It's everything we hoped! I have a tall 8 year old and she can stand inside! It was easy to assemble, it's fun and stays well vented. It's able to be moved for mowing. It is getting much play and will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for big kids and delivery service was wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly went relatively smooth. Instructions were not the best and some parts required two people, specifically with the roof. Also to note, I am 5' 2" and I could stand up inside of this in the center. The delivery service, ABF Freight, was fantastic. I was able to schedule the date and time slot I wanted the delivery at the time I purchased the item. They sent an email reminder the day before and called prior to the delivery. I received my order within the scheduled time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nicest Playhouse Anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: The playhouse is adorable...extremely durable and well made. Our 3 and 4 year old grandchildren are having lots of fun...they like the shutters on the windows that open up on both sides...the half door entry...the phone, the doorbell and everything else! Expect years of fun for them! And would definately purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra  Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy start, all worked out in the end
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Luckily, the cracked upper part was covered enough by the roof that rain shouldn’t get inside the plastic. Roof is warped. I figured it was not worth the hassle of sending it back if there was a chance of something similar happening. I said to myself that if the kids don’t mind it and it doesn’t effect the house, I’m ok with it. First two days and my 2-year-old can’t get enough of it!
customer_reviews.author: Allison B

customer_reviews.title: Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived in a very damaged box. One corner by the table is smashed in. My daughter and I gave up trying to get the window in. The instructions come with pictures only and hard to follow. Once together I know the kids will love it. It's just getting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Miller

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved the playhouse and it was very roomy. I thought it was a little pricey for what you get, I guess the larger the size, the more they cost. The instructions are not the best. If you can not understand visual instructions, you're going to be in trouble. My husband has experience in building and repairing, so we did "ok." It took us about 2 hours to put together. My granddaughter's smile and excitement made it all worth while when she saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The size of the playhouse is great as our little one is tall for her age. But very disappointed in the roof attachment as it was pushed down all the way and screwed in after several of us pushed together and used ratchet straps and it still did not align correctly and looks likes it's not on all the way.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This playhouse is exactly what we had hoped for our 3 year old. She and her friends will play in it for an hour at a time. Super easy to put together and cleans up nicely. A great size that she will use for years to come. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: April M.

customer_reviews.title: We got the little chairs with it and they fit in nicely around the little table top
customer_reviews.text: It is roomy inside, and a small adult can stand. Just wish there was more detail on the inside. The "kitchen" area is just a little sink/burners. NO fridge or oven. Not as cute as it could be inside. We got the little chairs with it and they fit in nicely around the little table top.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and very spacious
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and very spacious. We bought this for our church playroom. The children enjoy playing in the house and it is very spacious. I especially like that the house is open and not so closed off. It easy to see the kids playing inside the house from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: This was a GREAT purchase for my 4 year old grandchild
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT purchase for my 4 year old grandchild. She and I can both play in there. It is really a very very sturdy and darling playhouse. I am so glad I splurged and bought it. It was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Dasher

customer_reviews.title: Great size, since we wanted something a little larger
customer_reviews.text: Great size, since we wanted something a little larger. Was a pain to put together because of the way the roof goes on. Kind of a poor design, but we were able to get it put together after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this house. The ceiling height will allow her YEARS of enjoyment. The doorbell, skylight, telephone, little kitchen area, really make playing house FUN! She spends hours in there playing a day, and easily can fit a couple little friends with her.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than it looked like with the children in it
customer_reviews.author: Kay McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: nice gender neutral house
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loving it in their backyard, ages 2 and 4, boy and girl, nice gender neutral house, set in mulch for healthy outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Katvan

customer_reviews.title: Product it self fine. How ever pricing high
customer_reviews.text: Product it self fine. How ever pricing high. I thought I had a good deal but Walmart & Target advertising $459.99
customer_reviews.author: kelly van ry

customer_reviews.title: This must be the place!
customer_reviews.text: i love this house so much! It is huge! All my daycare kids fit into it at the same time! It is cute! The windows, the shutters, the dutch door, the roof line! It is fun! They love the phone (and i need more of those phones!), the door bell! They love opening and shutting the shutters! It is sturdy! I know this will last a very long time! The kids were sitting on the dutch door and it did not warp or bend. Thank you for making the perfect house for my daycare!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Opitz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Play House
customer_reviews.text: Just a beautiful play house. My 7 year old granddaughter loves it. I bought it because it was the only one I looked at that had a high ceiling. Even her Mom can go inside.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Overgard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it would of liked it to be a little higher
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my two year old grandson. He loves it. And it wasn't hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Yoast

customer_reviews.title: Super cute lol
customer_reviews.text: Excited for the new house, but it did not come with all the required parts, called the company, easy fix though.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Tall and roomy inside
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Tall and roomy inside, lots of fun shutters, shelves, a clock, a phone...... Love the doorbell. Would like to know if you can get a replacement phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Weisbecker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this house the boys had it assembled in 20 minutes with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Weckenbrock

customer_reviews.title: The perfect playhouse. . .
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my granddaughters ages 3 and 18 months! Hours and hours of fun playing house. Went us easy breezy! Quality and attention detail amazing. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: This playhouse is awesome and my daughter absolutely loves playing in it. I highly recommend getting the Step 2 New Traditions chairs to go along with the playhouse as they fit perfectly and are awesome to sit on and eat at the fold out table in the playhouse. Not sure about the quality of the product yet as we have only had for a week, but it's plastic so I don't foresee and issue there. Overall, this thing is pretty cool and provides hours of entertainment for the kid.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Man cave
customer_reviews.text: Love it! When my wife kicks me out of house I have plenty of room to relax, hang out with my friends, and catch some zzzzz's until my wife lets me back in.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL S.

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Plenty of room and lots of fun things to do in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Laughter

customer_reviews.title: Great, big playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful playhouse, I even fit in it. My niece and nephew love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This play house is the ultimate playhouse. Note it is large so plan for enough room. But if you have lots of kids, or tall kids. This is the house you want. I can even easily be in there. The table folds out nicely. And the kids love the shutters. It doesn't have a built in floor, which I didn't want mine too, less to clean. It did have a lot of steps to put together, but my hubby did it so I'm not complaining. It is a nice, sturdy house.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My daughter does not like it!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it a good quality house. I can write a review because we have it for year and half. And my daughter in a very short of time did not want to play in it at all, no matter how hard I try. So, I am happy we got it for free from relatives, in other case I would be very disappointed because it costs a lot of money. If you have more than one kid it s probably fun, if just one it s too boring for them.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina DiNobile

customer_reviews.title: Not a pleasure to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions in English! There were five other languages offered. Pictures are closeup so some times hard to tell which piece the instruction are showing.The bay window took two men with crowbars to get in place. Four steel rods hold the bottom together, but they didn't supply four rods for the top, The makers hope the roof will hold the top together. I am adding rods. I'm a Handyman and I've built metal and plastic sheds, but the instructions did not make it a pleasure to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Lots of room for kids, sturdy, fun. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

product_meta.title: Step2 Welcome Home Playhouse
product_meta.description:
This realistic outdoor playhouse for toddlers has so many features, little ones will be engaged for hours! Encourage social and pretend play with the Naturally Playful Welcome Home Playhouse by Step2. When friends ring the working doorbell, invite them inside through the working Dutch-style door, or chat through the bay window to see what they’re up to. Inside the playhouse for toddlers, little ones will find a full molded-in kitchen area with tons of storage space, and even a kitchen table that folds down when not in use! Multiple little ones can play together in the spacious toy playhouse, and the large windows with working shutters ensure adults can keep a watchful eye. Check out the neutral design that makes this kids’ playhouse a seamless addition to any backyard play space. Now little ones can “own” their own home just like their adult role models do! From the molded-in welcome mat to the working door and shutters, roof and siding details, and even the skylight, your toddler will be proud to take care of their space just like you. Made in the USA of US and imported parts.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Welcome Home Playhouse is a classically styled playhouse that blends with traditional landscapes in residential outdoor living areas. This playhouse comes with many features of a real home including a Dutch door, 2 large bay windows, peaked roof with skylight, table, handrail and welcome mat. The detailed interior has a full kitchen, range, storage cabinet and electronic cordless phone. Guests can ring the electronic doorbell to gain entry.
feature_bullets: Features include Dutch door, 2 large bay windows, peaked roof with skylight, table, handrail and welcome mat
Electronic doorbell with realistic chime sound
The detailed interior has a full kitchen, range, storage cabinet and electronic cordless phone

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
